thread.title_full: Vijay Sethupathi Madhavan Vikram Vedha teaser to release this week - Tamil Movie News

title: Vijay Sethupathi Madhavan Vikram Vedha teaser to release this week - Tamil Movie News
text: Bairavaa's milestone, Vikram's upcoming, and an intense political skirmish - IndiaGlitz weekly roundup Husband and Wife duo directors Pushkar and Gayathri are presently busy shooting for their third film 'Vikram Veda' with Madhavan, Vijay Sethupathi,Varalakshmi Sarathkumar, Kathir and Shraddha Srinath in the star cast. The shooting of the film commenced in November 2016. Now the film's producer Sashikanth of Y Not Studios banner has announced that the teaser of 'Vikram Vedha' will be released this week. That's a fantastic news for the fans of actors Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi, especially the former who has not had any release after 'Irudhi Suttru' that released in early 2016. 'Vikram Vedha' is expected to hit the screens during Summer 2017 as confirmed by director Pushkar in his earlier interview to IndiaGlitz ALSO READ: Dir Pushkar reveals 'Vikram Vedha' content, shooting and release plans
